Package fastily.jwiki.core

Contains the main classes for jwiki.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Auth
    Perform wiki authentication and initialization tasks for a Wiki.
    MQuery
    Perform multi-title queries.
    NS
    Contains default namespaces and methods to get non-standard namespaces.
    Reply
    Represents a reply from the server.
    Req
    Class used to do GET/POST requests.
    RSet
    High level functions to select and extract values from a list Reply objects.
    Settings
    Constants and global Settings for jwiki.
    SQ
    A template server query object that can be used to make a variety of queries.
    TPlate
    A simple, object-oriented representation of a MediaWiki template.
    URLBuilder
    Builds a URL with the specified domain.
    WAction
    Performs an action on a wiki.
    Wiki
    Main class of jwiki.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColorLog
    Colors a String and logs it to console.

Package fastily.jwiki.core Description

Contains the main classes for jwiki. Most of the classes here contain protected/private members which abstract the nasty/complicated details which do not, and should not concern the typical programmer. These classes all tie into Wiki.java, and for most users, this is the only class you're going to need.
Author:
Fastily
